thread.title: Card Liability Is Set to Shift
thread.title_full: Card Liability Is Set to Shift - WSJ

author: Robin Sidel
title: Card Liability Is Set to Shift
text:
A change that is putting new credit cards in many Americansâ€™ wallets will also shift billions of dollars of card-fraud liability to retailers from big banks.
Merchants are scrambling to deal Thursday with the end of a longtime policy in which financial institutions absorbed the cost of certain fraudulent credit-and-debit card transactions.
...
